text: Hagi tamagra Israeli vahe'mota witi hoza antegahaze. Hianagi witima vasage knazupa ave've traza vasagegahaze. Tusi tamu'nasisi hu'za eri'zana enerisageno zamavesra hugahie. Hianagi anampintira mago ne'zana e'ori'za zamagazegu hugahaze. Na'ankure Nagra Ra Anumzamo'na tusi narimpa ahezamante'sanua zamo anara hugahie.
